name: Tiny Pirates
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN MODE!

Hello there!

Made for Mini Jam 123: Web.
Limitation: There is no ground

No ground? Well, I decided to just flood the entire game!

Goal

Sink ships to earn money and reputation. Choose to ally either the Pirates or the British Royal Navy!

You can buy upgrades and Bank your gold at the main harbor (at spawn). If you die, you only lose the gold you are carrying.

Reach maximum reputation (in either direction) to win. This also unlocks a fun sandbox mode!

Controls

WASD - Move
J - Shoot Left
K - Shoot Right
ESC - Sound Settings

Notes

This game was a lot of fun to make, I might even expand on it after the jam!
I hope you enjoy!
-ManuGamesDev
